body_html:
Thanks so much goldsborough for your reply.
I have decided to change the python version from 3.5 to 3.6 and then reinstall anaconda3 (newest version). After that, I rebuild pytorch and it worked well). I hope it can help someone has this issue. In summarize, you have to change the python from 3.5 to 3.6 as

sudo add-apt-repository ppa:deadsnakes/ppa
sudo apt-get update
sudo apt-get install python3.6

Change the gcc version to 5.+
Reinstall Anaconda version : Anaconda3-5.1.0-Linux-x86_64.sh
Reinstall package of conda
Then rebuild again.

body:
Thanks so much goldsborough for your reply. 
I have decided to change the python version from 3.5 to 3.6 and then reinstall anaconda3 (newest version). After that, I rebuild pytorch and it worked well). I hope it can help someone has this issue. In summarize, you have to change the python from 3.5 to 3.6 as
```
sudo add-apt-repository ppa:deadsnakes/ppa
sudo apt-get update
sudo apt-get install python3.6
```
Change the gcc version to 5.+
Reinstall Anaconda version : Anaconda3-5.1.0-Linux-x86_64.sh
Reinstall package of conda
Then rebuild again.
